rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small foyer and storage space.
Spacious living area for family gatherings, connected to the central courtyard.
Dining space adjacent to the kitchen with views of the courtyard.
Modern Kerala-style kitchen with traditional design elements, ensuring adequate ventilation and Vastu-compliant south-eastern placement.
Master bedroom with attached bathroom located in the north-west sector of the plot, aligning with Vastu principles for calm and rest.
Additional bedroom located adjacent to master bedroom, maintaining privacy.
Bedroom for children or guests with proper ventilation and access to courtyard.
Designated library space, integrating traditional Kerala woodwork, quiet area with bookshelves along the east side for optimal light.
Primary bathroom integrated near master bedroom, ensuring privacy and adherence to water placement norms in Vastu.
Multi-purpose storage for household items, strategically placed near the entrance.

openings.description: Main entry with a traditional Kerala-style veranda leading to the entrance hall.
Windows allowing natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu guidelines.
Open passage to the central courtyard facilitating air circulation.
Balcony window offering east-facing light for positive energy.
Door opening to an adjoining outdoor kitchen space in the south-east, considered auspicious per Vastu.
